post.body: Your views on fighting games are just simply put....retarded my friend. and how did i forget soul caliber
http://twurl.nl/3ok0dt
I'm telling you man there is nothing really bad about it dude, it is slightly cheesy, but not anymore then a comic book movie.
Ross is twittering again. NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
DUDE THAT SUCKS!
I do need to play it baked though.
I bought that "game" when it came out. I thought it was cool for like 5 mins and then only play it to show it to people lol.
And you can't compare Vega to Johny cage lol.That's like comparing Wolverine to Spandyman. XD
MK>>>SF>>>SC>>>Tekken>>>DOA>>>VF>>>KOF>>>
http://www.thingsbearslove.com LMAO
MK>>>Street Fighter>>>Tekken>>>DOA>>>KOF
Just found out I have a unexpected $1000 bill. Everytime things are going good for me life just takes a huge shit on me....
the second movie on the other hand is a cheesefest and I like the second one in one of those its so bad you love it kind of ways.
Sitting in web class waiting for the class to start. Damn you slow teacher, I wouldnt have been on Amazon if class had started. :P
I just bought my very first comics I read when I was kid in graphic novel form. Can't wait to read them again!!!
And I passed motha fucka! SUH-WEETNESS
So since my doc crashed when I was taking the testout the teacher offered a seemingly imposible task: complete the Access part 100% in 20min
No way dude, I'm bringing that movie when I come over now. That is a good solid movie, and Johny Cage is the best character in it.
To this day it's still the best video game movie, I just watched it a couple weeks ago and it hold up dude.
YOUR RETARDED! THE FIRST MORTAL KOMBAT IS A GREAT MOVIE! I think your confusing it with the second one. XD
